AkAutoStmBufSettings
uBlockSize
uBufferSize
uMinBufferSize
AkUInt32 AkAutoStmBufSettings::uBlockSize

Hard user constraint: When non-zero, buffer size will be a multiple of that number, and returned addresses will always be aligned on multiples of this value.
